c74object.name: ahnoise~
c74object.description: ahnoise~ provides higher quality white noise (between -1. and 1.) than the standard MSP noise~ object. ahnoise~ is currently implemented using WELLRNG by Francois Panneton and Pierre L'Ecuyer for pseudorandom number generation (see http://www.iro.umontreal.ca/~panneton/WELLRNG.html).

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Outputs a high quality white noise signal in the range of -1. to 1.
